statements: SELECT * FROM ArtClasses WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, start_date FROM ArtClasses WHERE capacity > 20 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ArtClasses WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' AND location LIKE '%Studio%' ORDER BY class_id;
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_name, enrolled_students FROM ArtClasses WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT location, capacity, enrolled_students FROM ArtClasses WHERE enrolled_students < capacity ORDER BY enrolled_students ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM ArtClasses WHERE location = 'Studio A' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, start_date, end_date FROM ArtClasses WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_name, location FROM ArtClasses WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, enrolled_students FROM ArtClasses WHERE enrolled_students > 5 ORDER BY enrolled_students DESC, instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ArtClasses WHERE location IN ('Studio A', 'Studio B') AND start_date < '2023-06-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC, enrolled_students DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT * FROM class_attendance WHERE present = true;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM students INNER JOIN class_attendance ON students.student_id = class_attendance.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, AVG(student_grade) AS avg_grade FROM students GROUP BY student_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;

SELECT students.student_name, class_attendance.class_date FROM students INNER JOIN class_attendance ON students.student_id = class_attendance.student_id WHERE class_attendance.present = TRUE ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM classes ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, status FROM attendance WHERE status = 'present';
SELECT * FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE status = 'absent';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT name, age, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, age, grade_level FROM students JOIN classes ON student_id = teacher_id;

SELECT students.name, classes.class_name, attendance.attendance_date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN classes ON attendance.class_id = classes.class_id WHERE students.age < 25 ORDER BY attendance.attendance_date DESC;
SELECT s.name, c.class_name, a.attendance_date, a.status FROM students s JOIN attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id JOIN classes c ON a.class_id = c.class_id WHERE a.status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students WHERE attendance = TRUE;
SELECT class_name, teacher_name, class_time FROM classes ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT teacher_name, specialty FROM teachers WHERE email='example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, attendance FROM students WHERE attendance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE teacher_id = 101 ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, specialty FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id = 105;
SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE present = TRUE ORDER BY attendance_date;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM teachers
SELECT student_id, class_id, date, attended FROM attendance
SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM classes
SELECT progress_status, grade FROM progress
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, class_id, student_id FROM students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_id, department, teacher_name FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_id DESC;

SELECT student_name, class_name, date, attended FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN classes ON classes.class_id = attendance.class_id WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT student_name, progress_status, grade FROM students JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id WHERE grade > 80;
